latestReports.title: Will JIRA clash with Plesk on Install
latestReports.body:
I have a dedicated hosting account that is managed using Plesk (i am not very comfortable with Linux command line - learning). Plesk is fine as its easy to use for managing different web spaces.

  1. I want to know if i install JIRA on the same server will i run into any issues with Plesk. I believe the ports used for Plesk and JIRA are not the same (8080 for JIRA).
  2. Are there any good walk throughs for doing so
  3. Any recommendations on the install process
  4. Eventually, i want JIRA to be accessed via subdomain url j.domain.com and not xx.xxx.xx.xx:xxxx. how could i set this up

thanks a lot!

latestReports.title: Nested menu bar in angular 2 with material design
latestReports.body:
I am developing a web app in angular2. I am looking for a nested menu bar in material design.

I found a component in primeNG library (Tiered Menu) that matches my requirement. But the issue here is that it is not in material design.

Can anyone suggest a good library or component for my problem?

Or is there any way I can use primeNG component and make it material?

latestReports.title: Center focused control in Scrollview
latestReports.body: I have a scroll view with form inside. There is no issue with first couple textfields. However, starting from third one, the rest gets hidden by keyboard even when they are in focus. How do I tweak scrollview so that it cetners currently focus element on the screen?

latestReports.body: My question is this: How do I use the qtimeEdit in PYQT4 to loop & update, so it is always displaying the current time. Essentially, I would like it to function just like the Windows Taskbar time and date. My example

latestReports.title: How do I create a Referencing Outlet for an object?
latestReports.body: I'm making a custom control in Swift. How do make a "reference outlet" that can provide selectors FROM functions in other objects? I need something interface builder can reference to connect actions ( functions ) in other objects to respond to the control I'm building. UIButtons can do this. I basically building my own button. Has anyone done this?

latestReports.title: Delete .txt files in subfolders using batch script
latestReports.body:
Possible Duplicate:
Delete files in subfolder using batch script

I have to delete .txt files from a sub folder (with same name). My filepath is like as follows.

d:\test\test1\archive*.txt d:\test\try\archive*.txt d:\test\model\archive*.txt

I tried "del" command to delete the ".txt" files in above paths. But there are more than 100 folders in the folder "test". So it is very difficult to use "del" for each and every path.

Except the parent folder name of "archive" folder, everything remains the same for all the paths. So I guess there might be some easy way to delete the files using batch script.

Can anyone guide me whether there is any easy way to delete .txt files using batch script Or I have to repeat "del" for all 100 folders?

latestReports.title: Failed to install 'cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine':CordovaError: could not find -Info.plist file, or config.xml file
latestReports.body:
I'm getting some weird error while trying to add cordova wkwebview plugin in my existing application.

Error: if i try to update ios cordova platform

///////////////// admins-mbp:WKWebView admin$ cordova platform update ios Updating ios project... Error: Uncaught, unspecified "error" event. (updatePlatform is not callable from the iOS project API, you will need to do this manually.) /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Error: if i try to run cordova project from the CLI

////////////////// admins-mbp:WKWebView admin$ cordova run Error: could not find -Info.plist file, or config.xml file. /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Error: if i try to add cordova plugin WKWebview

/////////////// admins-mbp:WKWebView admin$ cordova platform update ios Updating ios project... Error: Uncaught, unspecified "error" event. (updatePlatform is not callable from the iOS project API, you will need to do this manually.) admins-mbp:WKWebView admin$ cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine Fetching plugin "cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine" via npm Installing "cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine" for ios Failed to install 'cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine':CordovaError: could not find -Info.plist file, or config.xml file. at Object.parseProjectFile [as parse] (/Users/Tanuj/World Bank/CVS CodeBase/WKWebView/WKWebView/platforms/ios/cordova/lib/projectFile.js:50:15) at Plugman.addPlugin (/Users/Tanuj/World Bank/CVS CodeBase/WKWebView/WKWebView/platforms/ios/cordova/lib/plugman/Plugman.js:69:31) at Api.addPlugin (/Users/Tanuj/World Bank/CVS CodeBase/WKWebView/WKWebView/platforms/ios/cordova/Api.js:187:53) at handleInstall (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/cordova-lib/src/plugman/install.js:611:6) at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/cordova-lib/src/plugman/install.js:407:28 at _fulfilled (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/q/q.js:787:54) at self.promiseDispatch.done (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/q/q.js:816:30) at Promise.promise.promiseDispatch (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/q/q.js:749:13) at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/q/q.js:509:49 at flush (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/cordova/node_modules/q/q.js:108:17) Error: could not find -Info.plist file, or config.xml file. admins-mbp:WKWebView admin$ /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

I'm new to this cordova platform, so i don't know what kind of error is this, also when i tried the same plugin in new project; it adds this plugin.

I think this is some cordova version issue. Please help me as i'm stuck with this and no way to move ahead.

latestReports.title: How to Concatenate and Interleaving in SAS
latestReports.body:
Duncan Hines

Flavor Height in cm.

Devil's food 39 Devil's food 36.5 White 30.5 White 34.5 Yellow 37.0 Yellow 35.0

Betty Crocker

Flavor Height in cm.

Devil's food 35.5 Devil's food 36.0 White 35.5 White 37.5 Yellow 32.5 Yellow 32.5

I have these two datasets,how do i A. Concatenate these two data sets and write the resulting data set to another data set B. Combine these two data sets interleaving by flavor and write the resulting data set to another data set.  Be sure you know which cake brand goes with which height value

The documentation is here : https://docs.strongloop.com/display/public/LB/OAuth+2.0#OAuth2.0-UsingtheOAuth2component

But it is very unclear, what models should i create and what rest endpoint should be defined?

Please help!

latestReports.title: Share common code between Xamarin.Forms and Qt project
latestReports.body:
I would like to share common code between a Xamarin.Forms project (C#) and a Qt project (C++).

Have you got a solution?

I try with a Visual C# Class Library which builds a DLL file. I succeeded to reference and use it in the Xamarin.Forms project, but I failed to use it in Qt. I supposed this is because the DLL is compiled from C# code.

Thanks.

latestReports.title: Website that generates a PDF
latestReports.body:
I'm new to web development, and I'm struggling finding a way to build a website that would build a PDF based on options chosen by a user. For example, Turbo Tax collects all information about taxes and then creates a tax return PDF. In my case, it's something much more simple. I'm trying to build a website that will generate a PDF with an on boarding paperwork for a new hires. The website would first collect info from a user and determine which forms to include. At my work, I have a folder with all individual PDF form (I-9 etc.) that I print one by one and spend hours organizing and putting all together. If there would be a website that will put them all together into one PDF that would be great. I'm assuming it is something that will require the use of JavaScript and possible a back end language. I am vey comfortable using HTML and CSS but still new to JS.

Thank you so much in advance for all your answers!! Alex

latestReports.title: Is NetLogo open-source or not?
latestReports.body: I was reading the book of Paul Longley about Geospatial Analysis, which writes that NetLogo is a free/shareware software instead of being open-source. enter image description here Is that true? Because Wikipedia and NetLogo's page write that it is open-source...

latestReports.title: Cleveland dot plot in ggplot2
latestReports.body: In the recent TIMSS report that I happened to come across, there's a plot (shown below) that in my opinion is very communicative. I've read that such plots are called Cleveland dot plots, though this one adds confidence intervals as well. I was wondering if it can be reproduced in ggplot2 or matplotlib. All hints are welcome.

latestReports.title: How to update release repositories in Maven?
latestReports.body:
I have the following case: - Maven project compiles fine on one machine where artifact A (release one) exists in that machine's local Maven repository, - artifact A was removed from the remote repository.

How can we be sure that the project builds fine on a new machine where local Maven repository is empty?

Why the numbering mismatch? Am I somehow not actually referencing the newest version?

I am new to python and hardly aware of it thus unable to implement this method.

latestReports.title: does awk support regular expression \{m,n\} or \{m\} or \{m,\} ?
latestReports.body:
I am looking to print all the columns in a file that can contain a 10 digit mobile number

I tried this awk '/[0-9]{10}/{for(i=1;i<=NF;++i)if($i~/[0-9]{10}/)print $i}' filename but this sems to be not working.

latestReports.title: How to create simple alarm clock on Python 3.x?
latestReports.body:
I started learning Python recently, so I don't know how to write some basic apps.

One of them - simple alarm clock. Actually, I tried to find some examples in Web, but they didn't work (

What I need? Well, just alarm clock. You put your hour (for example, "1:00 PM" to set alarm to this time) and then, of course, python simply print, for example, "Alarm!".

Do you have examples of this code for Python 3+?

Plus! I need something that might be work with telegram bots (yes, I need to integrate this code there), is this a problem?

Thank you very much in advance!

P.S. I tried this codes:

http://code.activestate.com/recipes/579117-simple-command-line-alarm-clock-in-python/ http://www.junauza.com/2008/04/simple-python-alarm-clock.html Python Alarm Clock

latestReports.title: Node.js running only 1 script?
latestReports.body:
I am busy with developing my own backend for my mobile game.

I have chosen for node.js, socket.io and mongodb after questioning if it was a good option for my game.

Now I have watched a lot of tutorials and read a lot, but one thing I can't understand is: Does node.js run only one script?

Every tutorial is developing one script like server.js or app.js, and runs it with cmd "node.js ***.js".

But no one explains how you can run multiple scripts.

I am asking this because I have a lot of logic and managing things in my game. If I programm all of my logic and manager in my server.js script, the script will get too big.

So how can I run my 2nd,3rd etc script? If this is possible(I have searched for it but could not find it).

latestReports.title: Getting information from json(php file) on external server
latestReports.body:
Currently I am building a project with C# and PHP.So far I have created a cryptor that can decrypt and encrypt data through web with database.I am currently working on an API for the desktop application, but I can't seem to parse JSON file correctly.I mean, I have the json file (ex.http://www.pgecryptor.byethost32.com/encrypt.php) but I cannot seem to get the information from it inside C# WPF(Form application). All I get is strings that are not correctly parsed and code that does not even exist in my page.How can I parse the information from this page(aka http://www.pgecryptor.byethost32.com/encrypt.php) to my C# application into label or DataGridView, or whatever control it might be?

Thank you a lot in advance!

latestReports.title: When using TabIndex, do numbers follow a logical order?
latestReports.body:
When using the tab index in asp.net, If i were to use a series of tab indices, is it possible to establish a hierarchy so that i can access things in order as a keyboard user?

for example, if I set all my tabs to index 0, and then set the first element inside those tabs to index 1, will that recognize it as an index order?

latestReports.title: Advice on structuring Backbone array data.
latestReports.body:
I'm in the middle of a process where I'm retrieving data from a REST API for use in my Backbone.js application. At this point I don't need to do any manipulations to the data except for the fact that the data returned is an array. However, the future might bring such requests, so I've already created a Backbone model and collection for this type of data.

I've read that you could map your Array data into an object inside your Backbone collection, but I'm wondering since I already have a model, if it would be better practise to already map each element inside my Backbone model.

Since I'm not an expert in the Backbone.js framework, any links with more documentation about this section would be greatly appreciated.

../deps/v8/src/base/platform/mutex.h:184: error: expected initializer before '<' token

latestReports.title: How can I protect my client-side code with e.g. a license key?
latestReports.body: There are some client-side libraries out there (for example the https://www.froala.com/wysiwyg-editor) which need to be activated with a license key. If no key was provided, there is a label "Unlicensed edition". How is such a protection implemented on a client-side library whose code is considered public? Any ideas on how to implement such a feature in my own libary?

latestReports.title: reporting api v4 unique events metric issue
latestReports.body:
I just want to ask you about the Reporting API v4 because I'm seeing different values between API response and web reporting view (Google Analytics dashboard). The metric is unique events.

This is the API Explorer result (if you want to see the query, read my first comment below, please notice green and red highlighted)

Result API Explorer screenshot

On the other hand I'm using the web report viewer and for unique events I'm always seeing different values (also I used many other filters, with different scenarios, always returning different data in unique events metric), but (the weird thing) is total events value is ok (in all cases). I used the same dates for API and web view calls (also I applied same filters on web reporting, also I tested using other metrics and the values are the same, so there is no layer 8 issue)

Web reporting screenshot

Do you know what's going on here? I don't know which value is correct, I don't know if API or web reporting is failing.

Best.-

latestReports.title: How to create a layout where the elements floats from left to right, top to bottom
latestReports.body:
I'm writing a a layout in CSS and HTML where I want the expected layout to be rendered out from left to right, top to bottom like this:

Each box has different height but the same width. I don't know how many boxes there are, it can vary from 2 to 20. I've tried float: left, but then you will get empty space depending on the size of the boxes. I've also tried column in CSS3, but It behaves very randomly, both on browser type, number of boxes and the size of the boxes. Does anyone know a smart trick to make it look like this, and preferably without the use of Javascript.
